languages.text: Cybermastiff always dodges area attacks without moving and counterattacks all attacks done in melee range, but can't use cover.

traits.locale_text: Cybermastiff always dodges area attacks without moving and counterattacks all attacks done in melee range, but can't use cover.

languages.text: The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.
languages.original_text: Кибермастиф всегда {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g} без перемещения и не получает бонусов от {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытий{/g}. Когда его атакуют в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, он немедленно контратакует.

traits.locale_text: The cyber-mastiff always dodges area attacks without moving and gains no benefits from cover. When attacked in melee range, immediately counter-attacks.

The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.

The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.

languages.text: Кибермастиф всегда {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g} без перемещения и не получает бонусов от {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытий{/g}. Когда его атакуют в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, он немедленно контратакует.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.

languages.text: Siber mastif, hareket etmeden her seferinde {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarından{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperden{/g} herhangi bir yarar sağlamaz. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş menzilinden{/g} saldırıya uğradığında anında karşı saldırı yapar.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastif, hareket etmeden her seferinde {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarından{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperden{/g} herhangi bir yarar sağlamaz. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş menzilinden{/g} saldırıya uğradığında anında karşı saldırı yapar.

languages.text: El cibermastín siempre {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} sin moverse y no recibe ningún beneficio por la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}. Cuando le atacan dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance de cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, contraataca inmediatamente.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.

traits.locale_text: El cibermastín siempre {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} sin moverse y no recibe ningún beneficio por la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}. Cuando le atacan dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance de cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, contraataca inmediatamente.

languages.text: 生化獒犬始终可以在不移动的情况下{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，但无法获得{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}效果。当它在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内遭到攻击时，会立刻进行反击。
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.

traits.locale_text: 生化獒犬始终可以在不移动的情况下{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，但无法获得{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}效果。当它在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内遭到攻击时，会立刻进行反击。

languages.text: Le cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} toujours les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} sans bouger et ne bénéficie pas des effets de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g}. S'il est attaqué à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de mêlée{/g}, il riposte immédiatement.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.

traits.locale_text: Le cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} toujours les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} sans bouger et ne bénéficie pas des effets de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g}. S'il est attaqué à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de mêlée{/g}, il riposte immédiatement.

languages.text: サイバーマスチフは、移動することなく常に{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の効果を受けない。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}で攻撃されると、即座に反撃する。
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.

traits.locale_text: サイバーマスチフは、移動することなく常に{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の効果を受けない。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}で攻撃されると、即座に反撃する。

languages.text: Der Cyber-Mastiff kann {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g} jederzeit {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}, ohne sich zu bewegen und erhält keine Vorteile durch {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}. Wird er in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} attackiert, geht er sofort zum Gegenangriff über.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving and gains no benefits from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. When attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, it immediately counter-attacks.

traits.locale_text: Der Cyber-Mastiff kann {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g} jederzeit {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}, ohne sich zu bewegen und erhält keine Vorteile durch {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}. Wird er in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} attackiert, geht er sofort zum Gegenangriff über.
